text: Mitchell Scott Hewer (born 1 July 1989) is an English actor. He is best known for playing Maxxie Oliver in the first two series of the E4 teen comedy-drama Skins (2007â€“2008). He has also appeared in Britannia High and Casualty. Hewer was born in Bristol. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Bristol Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
